snippet.title: Dragon Ball Z: Tenkaichi Tag Team - PSP - Gamescom 2010 Trailer
snippet.description:
The ultimate 4 player showdown continues in this new Dragon Ball Tenkaichi Tag Team trailer. Discover the brand new combination super attacks and new fighting techniques made possible by the tag team fighting system. Check also the story mode called 'Dragon Walker' and fly freely over the Dragon Ball World with cute SD characters.

Dragon Ball Z Tenkaichi Tag Team on PSP™ is now available at your local stores!
The demo is ready to download here : http://bit.ly/asnjBt 

Join the Draogn Ball Community on the game's official:
- Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/dbz.videogames
- Website: http://www.dragonball-videogames.com

Check out your local Namco Bandai website for more information on our other titles: http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/
